name: Skin tone: dark brown
description: You have a dark brown skin tone.

name: Skin tone: light
description: You have a light peach skin tone.

name: Skin tone: light brown
description: You have a light brown skin tone.

name: Skin tone: rose
description: You have a rosy pink skin tone.

name: Skin tone: bronze
description: You have a bronze or tan skin tone.

name: Facial hair: none
description: You have no hair on your face, it is shaven or simply untouched by the presence of hair.

name: Facial hair: goatee
description: You have a short beard at the tip of your chin.

name: Facial hair: circle beard
description: You have a moustache and a short beard, that both form a circle around your lips.

name: Facial hair: royale beard
description: You have a moustache and a short beard forming a patch under your lips.

name: Facial hair: anchor beard
description: You have a moustache and a beard starting with a strip going down from the bottom lip, then tracing the jaw lines. It looks a bit like an anchor, thus the name.

name: Facial hair: short boxed beard
description: You have a moustache and a short beard with trimmed sides. Thin patches connect them both, forming a 'box' around the lips, thus the name.

name: Facial hair: chevron moustache
description: You have a moustache that covers your entire top lip.

name: Facial hair: 3-day stubble
description: You have a short trimmed moustache and beard imitating a 3-day stubble.

name: Facial hair: horseshoe
description: You have a moustache with patches going down the chin from both ends, thus the name.

name: Facial hair: original moustache
description: You have a moustache with shortened ends, that covers only the skin above your upper lip.

name: Facial hair: mutton chops beard
description: You have long sideburns that connect to your moustache, with the tip of the chin shaven clean.

name: Facial hair: gunslinger beard
description: You have a horseshoe moustache and disconnected sideburns.

name: Facial hair: chin strip
description: You have a short beard in a form of a vertical patch under your bottom lip.

name: Facial hair: chin curtain
description: You have a full beard without a moustache, restricted to the chin, sometimes called a 'lion's mane'. Much like Abraham Lincoln's beard.

name: Facial hair: chin strap
description: You have beard along the jaw lines, circling tha chin, and no moustache.

name: Facial hair: beard
description: You have a moustache and a long beard, both formed by allowing free growth of hair, with no particular styling.

name: Facial hair: handlebar moustache
description: You have a moustache with long flared out ends.

name: Facial hair: neckbeard
description: You have a beard formed from hair grown on neck below the chin line. No moustache included.

name: Facial hair: pencil moustache
description: You have a very thin moustache just above the line of the upper lip.

name: Facial hair: shenandoah
description: Long full beard with no moustache, popular among Amish community, often with two pointed ends.

name: Facial hair: sideburns
description: You have patches of hair in front of your ears, that normaly would connect your hair with the beard, but they are here by themselves.

name: Facial hair: soul patch
description: You have a little bit of hair in the dip under your lower lip, and no other facial hair whatsoever.

name: Facial hair: toothbrush moustache
description: Charlie Chaplin used to have this short patch of hair just under the nose, but then that other guy used it as a characteristic, and it became unwelcomed.

name: Facial hair: Van Dyke
description: You have handlebar moustache with a chin strip or a small goatee.

name: Facial hair: walrus
description: You have long thick moustache, overshadowing you lips, that somewhat resembles facial hair of a walrus.

name: Facial hair: The Zappa
description: You have a wide soul patch and a full moustache that extends a bit downwards at the corners of your lips.
